General.Name: Shanghai Shimao Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Shimao Co.,Ltd engages in the commercial real estate development activities in China. The company develops, operates, and sells residential and commercial real estate projects. It also engages in the operation management of commercial sectors. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
